tr.td: Take 1 tablet (10 mg total) by mouth in the morning.
Take 1 tablet (25 mg total) by mouth in the morning and 1 tablet (25 mg total) in the evening. Take with meals.
Take 1 tablet (25 mg total) by mouth in the morning.
